answerText: Second Law of Thermodynamics [prompt on partial answers][10] This restatement of the Second Law of Thermodynamics states that the line integral of dQ over T for a cyclic process is equal to or less than zero.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 1 | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This statement puts an upper bound on the efficiency of a Carnot engine. For 10 points each: [10] Name this law, which in one formulation states that for a closed system, the entropy will always increase with time.
